Americans consume about 185,000 margaritas per hour, a figure widely reported several years ago. 
Surely that number has to be bigger. 
And most certainly it spikes on National Margarita Day, celebrated on Feb. 22, 2017. 
Here are some local restaurants offering margarita specials.
